annotations.description:
Provides a Jenkins server on RHEL 7. For more information about using this container image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/in-the-keyhole/openshift-jenkins/blob/master/README.md.

WARNING: By selecting this tag, your application will automatically update to use the latest version of Jenkins available on OpenShift, including major versions updates.

Provides a Jenkins 2.X server on RHEL 7. For more information about using this container image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/in-the-keyhole/openshift-jenkins/blob/master/README.md.
